scope.title: Digitalisation Advanced
scope.description: We zoom out to strategy, governance and whole energy system data sharing, with lots of real world examples.
scope.summary: We zoom out to strategy, governance and whole energy system data sharing, with lots of real world examples.
learningObjectives: Analyse how strategy, governance, and delivery constraints shape digital outcomes.
Explain how standards, policies, and operating models support sustainable change.
Evaluate roadmap and risk decisions with a realistic view of dependencies.
Apply measurement thinking to define outcomes and avoid vanity metrics.
